summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3501, for the improvement of Terry Avenue and Terry Avenue North, from Virginia Street to Valley Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by paving and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 43367 , and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
